item.description:
We are going to have Japanese Evening Table in Cambridge!

It's St. Patrick's day!!! Any pub will be packed as we are in heavy Irish culture.

I will be there by 6:30pm. I hope I could hold some spot for us. 

Whether you're learning Japanese or English, buy a drink, join the table, and practice your new language in a friendly and relaxed environment. If you're a beginner or just interested in culture, you'll fit in fine! Don't miss out on this opportunity to learn and practice over a few drinks. If you will be joining us, please use public transportation.  

*** Important notice ***

Please bring your ID or Passport. No ID No Drinks. Also you must be over 21 y/o.

No reservation have been made. We would like to have people come in earlier time, then Organizer will not be alone keeping your seats. We do appreciate your cooperation...

Thanks,

Mika
item.how_to_find_us: I will keep posting what's going on this day. Usually we gather at the pub area.
item.name: Harvard Sq. Japanese evening table
